books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.summary: A witty exploration of courtship and social class in 19th-century England.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.summary: Captain Ahab’s obsessive quest for the white whale unfolds into a gripping tale.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.summary: A scientist brings a creature to life in this gothic masterpiece.

books.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
books.summary: Detective Sherlock Holmes solves thrilling cases in Victorian London.

books.title: The Yellow Wallpaper
books.summary: A woman’s descent into madness is chronicled through her haunting fixation on wallpaper.

books.title: Dracula
books.summary: A chilling tale of Count Dracula's invasion of England and the group of people determined to stop him.

books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.summary: A man remains forever young while his portrait ages, reflecting his moral corruption.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.summary: An orphaned governess overcomes hardship and heartbreak to find independence and love.

books.title: The Time Machine
books.summary: A scientist ventures into the distant future where he encounters the strange evolution of humanity.

books.title: A Tale of Two Cities
books.summary: A gripping story of sacrifice and redemption set during the French Revolution.

books.title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
books.summary: Dorothy and her friends journey through a magical land in search of wisdom, courage, and home.

books.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
books.summary: Alice tumbles into a whimsical world of curious creatures and surreal adventures.

books.title: Flatland: A Romance of Many Dimensions
books.summary: A satirical science fiction novella about a two-dimensional world, challenging Victorian thinking and dimensionality.

books.title: The Tale of Peter Rabbit
books.summary: A mischievous young rabbit sneaks into Mr. McGregor’s garden and gets into trouble in this classic tale.

books.title: The War of the Worlds
books.summary: A pioneering alien invasion story describing the catastrophic conflict between humans and Martians.

books.title: Heidi
books.summary: The story of a young girl who brings joy and transformation to those around her in the Swiss Alps.

books.title: The Call of the Wild
books.summary: Buck, a domesticated dog, is thrust into the wild Yukon where he must rediscover his primal instincts to survive.

books.title: The Prince
books.summary: A political treatise offering advice to new princes and rulers on how to maintain power and control.

books.title: Hamlet
books.summary: The troubled Prince of Denmark seeks revenge for his father's murder in this Shakespearean tragedy.

books.title: Leaves of Grass
books.summary: A bold collection of poetry celebrating the human spirit, nature, and democracy.

books.title: Oedipus the King
books.summary: The classic Greek play where Oedipus unwittingly fulfills a tragic prophecy by killing his father and marrying his mother.

books.title: Paradise Lost
books.summary: An epic poem about Satan’s rebellion and humanity’s fall from grace after the temptation of Adam and Eve.

books.title: The History of the Peloponnesian War
books.summary: A detailed contemporary account of the conflict between Athens and Sparta during the Peloponnesian War.
